19\)

```{r}
data <- read.table("trampoline.txt",header = TRUE)
data
```

```{r}
n = dim(data)[1]
fit <- glm(data = data, trampoline~children,family=binomial)
summary(fit)
```

```{r}
xhat = 3
predict.glm(fit, newdata = data.frame(children = xhat), type = "response")
predict.glm(fit, newdata = data.frame(children = 0), type = "response")
```
